text: Validate your audience's engagement by acknowledging their support.
source_book: The Diary of a CEO_ 33 Laws of Business and Life (2023)

text: The perceived authority of a narrative is strengthened by its creator's connection to the audience.
source_book: The Diary of a CEO_ 33 Laws of Business and Life (2023)

text: IF  THEN Maintain an authentic relationship with your audience to sustain their engagement.
source_book: The Diary of a CEO_ 33 Laws of Business and Life (2023)

text: IF  THEN Align narrative content with the demonstrated interests of your audience to maximize impact.
source_book: The Diary of a CEO_ 33 Laws of Business and Life (2023)

text: CLAIM: The success of a narrative depends on the creator's ability to resonate with its intended audience.
source_book: The Diary of a CEO_ 33 Laws of Business and Life (2023)
